channel.title: How do I change the IP?
channel.description: I'm using a client source which doesn't let you change the IP through the client, How do I change which IP it connects to?

item.title: How do I change the IP?
item.dc:creator: @jajab15 jajab15
item.description:
@jajab15 wrote:

Are you saying the ip you use to connect to your server ???

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change the IP?
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

[quote=“Kyle11594, post:14, topic:170567”][quote author=Projeckt Revolution link=topic=230516.msg1974441#msg1974441 date=1199418996]
You Mean, When You Try Logging In, The Client Doesnt Have A Bar For: “Ip Address”
If So, I Think That Means Its Made For A Certain Server…
[/quote]

Wow… Mr. I wish I had good grammar, I make caps on first letter of each word. Wow…[/quote]

Wow… Mr. I feel the need to spam this post and ridicule others about small things because I’m a big bad king. Your cool.

Back on subject; did it work?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the IP?

item.title: How do I change the IP?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Ksu, post:9, topic:170567”][quote author=leroyajax link=topic=230516.msg1974551#msg1974551 date=1199420445]
lol search in client.java
[/quote]

lmao have you worked with clients before? It’s not in there… -.-[/quote]Dont make fun of others when you have no clue what you’re talking about. It is in client.java. Search for:

public final URL getCodeBase()

Under that you should see something like…

return new URL("http://SERVERIPHERE:" + (80 + anInt958));

Change it to your liking.

Read full topic
